=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hygieia + Encapsulated 2% Retinol Cream – Liposomal Anti-Wrinkle Cream for Face, Neck & Body – Fast & Deep Cellular Absorption – Day or Night Cream for Firming, Lifting & Repairing Aging Skin, 4oz
Review Date: 2022/08/21
Store: Hygieia +
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Hygieia +', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Retinol', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '3.03 x 2.87 x 2.32 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '607469295352', 'Manufacturer': 'Hygieia +'}
Review Text: This has really helped with wrinkles and sagging skin I use it as a weekly skin care routine
Review Title: great product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Summer's Eve Spa Set for Women | Gift Box | Women's Post Shave Hydrating Serum, 1oz Tube | Cleansing Feminine Wash, 12oz Bottle
Review Date: 2022/08/22
Store: Summer's Eve
Product Description: ["Give a special someone or pamper yourself and experience Daily Intimate Beauty with the Summer's Eve Spa gift set containing a Luxurious Cleansing Wash and an Intimate Serum. The Summer's Eve Spa Luxurious Cleansing Wash has a calming chamomile fragrance blended with essential oils. The creamy, pearly feminine wash is hypoallergenic and gynecologist tested, safe and gentle enough to use every day. Free from dyes and parabens, the wash cleanses and leaves the skin feeling pampered. Indulge in relaxation and renewal every day. The Summer's Eve Spa after shave Skin Serum was created for your most delicate intimate areas to comfortably hydrate, smooth and soften. Specifically designed to soothe delicate, freshly shaven or waxed intimate skin. 9 out of 10 women say the serum soothed skin after shaving. The serum is infused with vitamin E, coconut oil and aloe. Elevate your intimate care routine with the cleansing wash and luxurious serum from our Summer’s Eve Spa Kit for Women Gift Set."]
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Scent': 'Spa', 'Brand': "Summer's Eve", 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Active Ingredients': 'Lactic_acid', 'Product Dimensions': '8.87 x 2.22 x 9.32 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'UPC': '041608002324', 'Manufacturer': 'Prestige Consumer Healthcare', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
Review Text: This product has a really lovely aroma the scent is naturally sweet and it is very gentle for me having sensitive skin, I felt clean, revived and refreshed after using it!!!
Review Title: So Soft on the Skin!!!
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Everyday Beauty Renewal Night Cream Nourishing Facial Moisturizer with Brown Algae Extract, Squalene, Hyaluronic Acid and Glycerin to Moisturize and Protect Skin, Reduce Signs of Aging, 1 oz. Jar

Review Text: This is a very nice lightweight moisturizer I use it every day makes my face feel softer keeps it moist not dry no irritation so anyone can use this
Review Title: Very nice & lightweight
Rating: 5.0

I have not seen my puffy under eyes go down or dark circles go away but I am still using the product. will come back and update if I see any changes

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

        [Your positive summary here]

        NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
        [Your negative summary here]

        OVERALL SUMMARY:
        [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has had numerous positive experiences, particularly with skincare products that provide effective results. High ratings were given for several creams noted for their lightweight texture, moisturizing properties, and ability to reduce signs of aging. The pleasant scents and gentle formulations, especially for sensitive skin, were highlighted as significant benefits. The user expressed satisfaction with products that offered immediate revitalization, leaving the skin feeling clean, refreshed, and pampered. Additionally, the enchanting aroma of a fragrance was appreciated, enhancing the overall user experience.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
The user experienced mixed results with certain products, particularly eye creams that did not deliver on promises of reducing dark circles and puffiness. Ratings of 3.0 and 3.3 for some skincare items indicated disappointment, as the user did not observe the expected improvements. One product was described as "ok," suggesting a lack of efficacy despite ongoing use. These experiences reflect a tendency towards skepticism regarding the effectiveness of some products the user tried, leading to an overall feeling of dissatisfaction.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
Overall, the user's shopping experience reveals a blend of satisfaction and disappointment. They enjoyed effective skincare solutions that provided moisture and anti-aging benefits while valuing pleasant scents and gentle formulations. However, certain products, particularly in the eye care category, fell short of expectations, contributing to a sense of frustration. The contrasting experiences point to a cautious optimism, as the user remains open to exploration while navigating products that deliver on their claims.

target_interaction.title: Don’t see any results!
target_interaction.text: New Curves is  100% All Natural Fenugreek Gel comes in a 8.8oz container. It is a Gel I have used it and I have not seen any results so I’m not sure how long it takes to show but I’ve used it for a while and still don’t see any results. It’s supposed to help reduce cellulite and plump up your breasts or your butt area. It may work for someone else, but it’s not for me.
target_interaction.title_meta: New Curves - 100% All Natural Fenugreek Gel 8.8oz (250gr) - Gel De Fenogreco 100% Natual, Sin Colorantes Ni Aditivos, Con Semillas Reales De Fenogreco. For Breasts and Butt, Tonifica & Reduce Tallas.
features: GEL DE FENOGRECO 100% NATURAL SIN COLORANTES NI ADITIVOS - PARA AUMENTAR EL BUSTO Y GLUTEOS DE MANERA NATURAL.
LA SEMILLA DE FENOGRECO AYUDAN A AUMENTAR EL VOLUMEN DE LAS CURVAS DE LA MUJER, CONTENIENDO UN COMPONENTE MUY PARECIDO A LA HORMONA DE ESTROGENO.
NOTE EL AUMENTO O BIEN LA TONIFICACION DE SUS PECHOS Y GLUTEOS AL CABO DE UN MES DE USO!
COLOR CAFE CLARO - 100% NATURAL, LOS OTROS GELES CON COLORES ROJOS O ESCARLATA USAN COLORANTES QUE MANCHAN Y DANAN TU PIEL.
FENUGREEK GEL 100% NATURAL WITHOUT DYES OR ADDITIVES - TONIFIES YOUR BODY THE NATURAL WAY!
description: FENUGREEK GEL 100% NATURAL WITHOUT DYES OR ADDITIVES - TO INCREASE THE BUST AND BUTTOCKS NATURALLY. THE FENUGREEK SEED HELP TO INCREASE THE VOLUME OF WOMEN'S CURVES, CONTAINING A COMPONENT VERY SIMILAR TO THE ESTROGEN HORMONE. NOTICE THE INCREASE OR TONE OF YOUR BREASTS AND BUTTOCKS AFTER ONE MONTH OF USE! LIGHT BROWN COLOR - 100% NATURAL, OTHER GELS WITH RED OR SCARLET COLORS USE DYES THAT STAIN AND DAMAGE YOUR SKIN.

videos.title: Feels warm after applying, I think it is working…
